title: How To Approach Your Partner When They Don't Want To Grow | Relationship Theory
description: Tom and Lisa discuss why you need to pay attention to your relationship, even when you're busy, and how to support a partner who isn't doing everything they can to grow.   Check out our amazing sponsors!
